title: Ranjan brought to PCoI on political victimization
content: Former Member of Parliament Ranjan Ramanayake, who is currently incarcerated, has been brought to the Presidential Commission of Inquiry (PCoI) probing the incidents of political victimization.He was escorted to the said commissionâ€™s police unit by the prison officials at around 9.30 a.m. today (February 17).In January 2020, a three-member Presidential Commission of Inquiry was appointed to inquire into political victimizations that have taken place from 2015 to 2019. Ramanayake served as a state minister during this period.
